dokku.predeploy: export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive && echo 'ttf-mscorefonts-installer msttcorefonts/accepted-mscorefonts-eula select true' | debconf-set-selections && apt-get update && apt-add-repository multiverse && apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends fontconfig ttf-mscorefonts-installer && fc-cache
